Characteristic.name: Magnetic Flux Density - 2D

Field.name: Magnetic Flux Density: X-Axis
Field.Description: This characteristic contains measurements of magnetic flux density for two orthogonal axes: X and Y. This characteristic is composed of two fields having the same format: In order of LSO to MSO, the fields are: X-Axis, Y-Axis. 1 x 10^-7 Tesla equals 0.001 Gauss.

Field.name: Magnetic Flux Density: Y-Axis
Field.Description: This characteristic contains measurements of magnetic flux density for two orthogonal axes: X and Y. This characteristic is composed of two fields having the same format: In order of LSO to MSO, the fields are: X-Axis, Y-Axis. 1 x 10^-7 Tesla equals 0.001 Gauss.

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet
